meanings.definition: The quality or state of being sinuous
meanings.sent1: The sinuosity of the river made it challenging to navigate.
meanings.sent2: The sinuosity of the path through the forest added excitement to the hike.
meanings.sent3: The sinuosity of the snake's movements entertained the children at the zoo.
meanings.sent4: The sinuosity of her dance moves captivated the audience.
meanings.sent5: The sinuosity of the roller coaster's twists and turns left riders exhilarated.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being full of curves or turns
meanings.sent1: The sinuosity of the road required careful driving to navigate safely.
meanings.sent2: The sinuosity of the mountain trail provided stunning views around every bend.
meanings.sent3: The sinuosity of the plot in the movie kept the audience guessing until the end.
meanings.sent4: The sinuosity of the labyrinthine caves made exploration an exciting adventure.
meanings.sent5: The sinuosity of the roller coaster's track thrilled riders with unexpected twists.
